name: Smartphone X Pro
product_des: The Smartphone X Pro features a 6.7-inch display, 128GB storage, and a powerful camera system. Perfect for photography enthusiasts and tech lovers.

name: Gaming Laptop Z
product_des: The Gaming Laptop Z boasts a high-refresh-rate screen, a powerful GPU, and 16GB of RAM. Ideal for gamers and power users.

name: 4K Ultra HD TV
product_des: Experience stunning visuals with the 4K Ultra HD TV. It features vibrant colors and a slim design, perfect for movie nights.

name: 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD LED TV
product_des: Enjoy a cinematic experience with the 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD LED TV. Its impressive 4K resolution delivers sharp, vibrant images, while its slim profile and modern design make it a stylish addition to your living space.
